question.title: CodeQL Assignment do not report all assignments in code
question.body:
I am using following Java code

package com.example;

public class TestClass {
    public String s = "test";
    public void directCall() {
        s = "test2";
        ValidationUtils.validateRequest("test");
    }

    private void viaLambda() {
        Runnable r = () -> {
            System.out.println("Validating request...");
            ValidationUtils.validateRequest("test");
        };
        r.run();

    }
}

And CodeQL is as

import java

from AssignExpr a

select a

This is only reporting me

public String s = "test"; and s = "test2";

But it does not report Runnable r = () -> {

What is the right way to do it?
